post:
Thank you LET! HostMyBytes has really come a long way since our last offer. We're now hosting over 1,000 customers. We're absolutely thrilled and entirely thankful for our customers from LowEndTalk. 

To show our gratitude, we're giving some great deals on our shared & reseller services. If you're thinking about waiting, be careful, since we have limited stock on this promotion!

**Shared: "Gigabyte" Plan from $1.99/m**

    50 GB Storage Space
    500 GB Bandwidth
    Unlimited Domains Allowed
    cPanel Control Panel
    Softaculous Auto Installer
    CloudLinux Abuse Protection
    R1Soft Daily Backups
    Normally: $8.95/mo 
    LowEndTalk Price: $1.99/mo - coupon code: LETGB
    https://clients.hostmybytes.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3 
    Limited to first 10 uses!

**Reseller: "Company" Plan from $3.99/m**

    75 GB Storage Space
    1000 GB Bandwidth
    Unlimited Accounts
    cPanel Control Panel
    Softaculous Auto Installer
    CloudLinux Abuse Protection
    R1Soft Daily Backups
    Normally: $9.95/mo 
    LowEndTalk Price: $3.99/mo - coupon code: LETRS2
    https://clients.hostmybytes.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=75
    Limited to first 5 uses!
